delete_by_query._description_: this file is NEST specific and lists removed parameters that should be obsoleted and not removed in the client in a minor release

explain.description: Specify whether to return detailed information about score computation as part of a hit
explain.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint

stored_fields.description: A comma-separated list of stored fields to return as part of a hit
stored_fields.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint

docvalue_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return as the docvalue representation of a field for each hit
docvalue_fields.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint

lowercase_expanded_terms.description: Specify whether query terms should be lowercased

suggest_field.description: Specify which field to use for suggestions
suggest_field.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint

suggest_mode.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint

suggest_size.description: How many suggestions to return in response
suggest_size.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint

suggest_text.description: The source text for which the suggestions should be returned
suggest_text.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint

track_scores.description: Whether to calculate and return scores even if they are not used for sorting
track_scores.obsolete: Bad client mapping, never available on this endpoint
